item.title: US Bonds Rally Stalls as Powell Endorses a Patient Fed Approach
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The Treasury market stalled after Federal Reserve officials indicated theyâ€™re still on course to deliver two interest-rate reductions this year, despite the risk of resurgent inflation. US government debt is finishing Wednesday with mild gains after policymakers left their benchmark r...
